Sackcloth & Ashes x Iceland

COLLABORATION PROPOSAL

Oh hey Sackcloth & Ashes.
Let's roadtrip around Iceland together and make some magic.

I've got a vision.


I've an exciting trip planned to Thorsmork in Iceland soon and wanted to bring Sackcloth & Ashes along! We can also take advantage of the lack of tourists in Iceland at the moment. This rare opportunity allows us to create content in Iceland's most famous spots with your product in these locations. Together with Sackcloth & Ashes we can turn it into an epic road trip, keep us warm on the road.


For the next few weeks, I will be cruising around Iceland in my camping van, drinking delicious coffee in the morning before heading out capturing photo and video content for your social media as well as promoting Sackcloth & Ashes to my audience.


Photography is about storytelling; it’s about capturing an experience. I found photography through our love of adventure, travel and exploration and feel there’s so much more behind every image than can be summed up through a single photograph. Through my work I try to capture the essence of the moment, expressing the atmosphere and emotions felt at the time to bring the audience along for the ride. In every project I aim to build a whole body of work that includes a variety of shots to capture the lifestyle and experience around the shoot.

ABOUT ME

Micro-influencer, photographer, web developer and social media content creator. I am passionate about outdoor traveling, lifestyle and female entrepreneruship. I love helping brands capture the essence of their personality and really telling a story through my work.


My biggest passion is to circle the globe promoting scenic destinations, unique brands and stunning landscape. My overall goal of my brand is to not only inspire women to get out and experience the beauty of the world, but live the life they want to live.

I'll be traveling with a full professional setup - Canon 5D mk IV, Canon R, Mavic Drone, ready to create high resolution content for your brand. I love nothing more than create beautiful imagery and content for brands and together we can make magic happens.

THE EXPERIENCE

I've worked with local brands, luxury villas and hotels, cafes and restaurants, and tour companies.

I’m highly adaptable with my work, so whether I’m shooting in a cozy cafe, or halfway up a windswept mountain, I’m comfortable and confident with my abilities. My real passion lies in the outdoors and I am experienced in hiking, camping, climbing, as well as being cold, tired, and hungry. I’m comfortable and relaxed in all situations, and with a passion for travel I’m prepared to go anywhere in order to get the shot.

From the streets of Reykjavik Iceland to the highlands, we want to see it all in a Sackcloth & Ashes blankets.

My Pitch

I'll be exploring Iceland over the next few weeks and would love to do it as a van camping trip. In exchange for providing two blankets I could offer you ...

  • 10x high resolution professionally edited photos, for your own use.
  • Mention in a minimum of 8 times instagram stories on my instagram account
  • 3 dedicated instagram posts tagging @sackclothxashes
